creator: o-soya@seiss.co.jp

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This looks like
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/myfaces-users/200610.mbox/%3C71235db40610191300o7c8260c2s974c830876c4e25@mail.gmail.com%3E
